title: Founder's Day, Joe Biden, Tristan Thompson, Jaheim Verzuz Usher and more.
itunes:title: Founder's Day, Joe Biden, Tristan Thompson, Jaheim Verzuz Usher and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It's free and it's the best way to start. The CLO was blown back by one of the letters and was unable to advise. Martin Louis the King, Jr. is up to something again! 46 and 49 were in The A. Juniors sports report covered something very specific. T and K spark the cheating discussion. Steve is talking about Tommy's big ass head. Jaheim is a funny guy. We hear from our favorite listener. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve said it best, "lose your fear because God is here" and that's real.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
